ResourceHeader.Description: This dataset contains dynamic spectra daily plots describing SWAVES radio fluxes observed by both LFR and HFR receivers of both STEREO-A and STEREO-B spacecraft in the whole nominal range of 367 frequencies, from 2.5 to 16025 kHz.
